date:
8th of September, 2025
10 AM to 5 PM
title: Welcome day 2025-2026
body:
Visit us during Welcome Day!

Come by our booth, get to know the association, and explore live the potential of two key areas of artificial intelligence:

Real-time image recognition

Test your skills in an interactive platform game controlled through Computer Vision: a camera will detect and track your hand movement, which will serve as the game control.

AI Image Generation

Create your own personalized avatar with Stable Diffusion, a diffusion model based on deep neural networks that transforms text descriptions (prompts) into high-quality realistic images.

We look forward to seeing you on September 8th from 10 AM to 5 PM at the EPS of Universidad Carlos III!
